LanguageData.BoriStart.label: A Story of Sheep and Dogs
LanguageData.BoriStart.description: This is the story of sheep and dogs in search of a new paradise.
LanguageData.BoriStart.scenario.name: A Story of Sheep and Dogs
LanguageData.BoriStart.scenario.description: This is the story of sheep and dogs in search of a new paradise.
LanguageData.BoriStart.scenario.summary: This is a story of sheep and dogs.
LanguageData.BoriStart.scenario.parts.GameStartDialog:
Eden, the home planet of the Bori and Sheepawn, has been destroyed.
It only took two patrol ships from the ant-like aliens to completely destroy the planet. The surviving refugees managed to save their lives by signing the Refugee Relief and Relocation Act.
They had little say in the matter. Frustrated, but out of options, they ran, surviving on what little they could find.

Now, it's time for the Bori and the Sheepawn to find their new paradise.
